briefTitle: Intervention With Vitamin D and Omega-3 Supplements and Incident Heart Failure

armGroups.label: Vitamin D and fish oil
interventionNames: Drug: Vitamin D and fish oil

armGroups.label: Fish oil and vitamin D placebo

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With New Heart Failure Hospitalization
outcomeMeasures.description: We will consider any hospitalization for heart failure among participants enrolled in the parent VITAL trial for this ancillary study. Incident heart failure are initially captured through annual questionnaires with subsequent validation by a team of physicians with expertise in cardiovascular medicine and epidemiology. We excluded 36 participants with prevalent heart failure at the time of randomization for the primary analysis.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Recurrent Heart Failure Hospitalization
outcomeMeasures.description: Recurrent heart failure hospitalizations ascertained either by review of medical records and/or use of CMS (Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services) data.
